answerText: In Cold Blood[10] In Cold Blood was written by this author, who was photographed looking "fierce" for his novel, Other Voices, Other Rooms. He also wrote about Holly Golightly in Breakfast at Tiffany's.
heading: MUT |2012 | 2 | 13 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This work details the murder of Herbert Clutter and his family. For 10 points each: [10] Name this non-fiction novel that is considered to be the first of the "true crime" genre. It focuses on the psychological state of the killers, Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.
